# Max-Height

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                | Support        |
| -------------------- | -------------- |
| `max-h-0`            | âœ… Full Support |
| `max-h-[n]`          | âœ… Full Support |
| `max-h-{n}`          | âœ… Full Support |
| `max-h-full`         | âœ… Full Support |
| `max-h-screen`       | âœ… Full Support |
| `max-h-min`          | ğŸŒ Web only    |
| `max-h-max`          | ğŸŒ Web only    |
| `max-h-fit`          | ğŸŒ Web only    |
